tooltip.mekaweapons.magnetizer: Displays the Meka-Bow and the Meka-Tana in player's back if they are in inventory. (Curios needed)
description.mekaweapons.arrowenergy_unit: Fire arrows made of pure energy. Removes the need for ammunition.
description.mekaweapons.autofire_unit: Fires automatically when Meka-Bow is fully charged.
